site.description:
Word wrap feature. Wordwrap plugin will break long lines without modifying underying file physically. New menu item "Word Wrap" is added to editor context menu.
Behaviour of this feature is not perfect! It is wrapping properly but will damage line numbering, active line highlight etc rendering. All line numbers, line highlights etc will be OK after disabling wrap for active editor.
